long_description: Cute? Fun? Colorful? Yes! Yes! Yes! Many words describe the Dansko Emmy shoes, a fun, lightweight, casual Mary Jane style with stain-resistant suede and neoprene accents for comfort on the go. Polyester lines the suede uppers for soft and breathable comfort; neoprene accents enhance the fit. Rubber/recycled polyurethane midsole and thermoplastic urethane board offer contoured comfort and support. Low-profile, slip-resistant outsoles make the Dansko Emmy shoes ideal for kitchen and hospital settings. These shoes proudly carry the Seal of Acceptance from the APMA (American Podiatric Medical Association). Closeout.
